subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the UI component.

subMembers.name: animation
subMembers.description: Configures UI component visibility animations. This object contains two fields: [show] and [hide].

subMembers.name: hide
subMembers.description: An object that defines the [animation properties] used when the UI component is being hidden.

subMembers.name: show
subMembers.description: An object that defines the [animation properties] used when the UI component is being shown.

subMembers.name: contentComponent
subMembers.description: An alias for the [contentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a custom component. Refer to [Using a Custom Component] for more information.

subMembers.name: contentRender
subMembers.description: An alias for the [contentTemplate] property specified in React. Accepts a rendering function. Refer to [Using a Rendering Function] for more information.

subMembers.name: contentTemplate
subMembers.description: Specifies a custom template for the UI component content.

subMembers.name: deferRendering
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to render the UI component's content when it is displayed. If **false**, the content is rendered immediately.

subMembers.name: elementAttr
subMembers.description: <!-- %shortDescription% -->

subMembers.name: height
subMembers.description: Specifies the UI component's height.

subMembers.name: hideOnOutsideClick
subMembers.description: <!-- %shortDescription% -->

subMembers.name: hideOnParentScroll
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to hide the {WidgetName} when users scroll one of its parent elements.

subMembers.name: maxHeight
subMembers.description: Specifies the maximum height the UI component can reach while resizing.

subMembers.name: maxWidth
subMembers.description: Specifies the maximum width the UI component can reach while resizing.

subMembers.name: minHeight
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum height the UI component can reach while resizing.

subMembers.name: minWidth
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum width the UI component can reach while resizing.

subMembers.name: position
subMembers.description: Positions the UI component.

subMembers.name: shading
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to shade the background when the UI component is active.

subMembers.name: shadingColor
subMembers.description: Specifies the shading color. Applies only if [shading] is enabled.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the UI component is visible.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the UI component's width.

subMembers.name: wrapperAttr
subMembers.description: Specifies the global attributes for the UI component's wrapper element.

properties.name: dxOverlay
properties.description: The **Overlay** UI component represents a window overlaying the current view. It displays data located within the HTML element representing the UI component.

Methods.name: repaint()
Methods.description: Recalculates the UI component's size and position without rerendering.

Methods.name: toggle(showing)
Methods.description: Shows or hides the UI component depending on the argument.

Events.name: onHidden
Events.description: A function that is executed after the UI component is hidden.

Events.name: onHiding
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is hidden.

Events.name: onShowing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is displayed.

Events.name: onShown
Events.description: A function that is executed after the UI component is displayed.

Events.name: hidden
Events.description: Raised after the UI component is hidden.

Events.name: hiding
Events.description: Raised before the UI component is hidden.

Events.name: showing
Events.description: Raised before the UI component is displayed.

Events.name: shown
Events.description: Raised after the UI component is displayed.

subMembers.name: dxOverlayAnimation
subMembers.description: Configures UI component visibility animations. This object contains two fields: [show] and [hide].

subMembers.name: hide
subMembers.default: { type: 'pop', duration: 300, to: { opacity: 0, scale: 0.55 }, from: { opacity: 1, scale: 1 } } }
subMembers.description: An object that defines the [animation properties] used when the UI component is being hidden.

subMembers.name: show
subMembers.description: An object that defines the [animation properties] used when the UI component is being shown.
